name: Copper Dragon Wyrmling
movement: 30 ft. walk, 30 ft. climb, 60 ft. fly
description: The Copper Dragon Wyrmling is a medium-sized dragon with agility and a cunning demeanor, exhibiting a vibrant copper sheen across its scaled body.
memorable: This dragon is not just formidable in combat but is also incredibly stealthy in mountainous terrain, making it a deadly ambusher.
goals: Typically seeks to hunt down prey or defend its territory while enjoying the thrill of cunning maneuvers in battles.
relations: May be encountered with other dragon types or as a young ally to adventurers seeking wisdom and assistance.
environment: Commonly found in mountainous regions and caves, where it can utilize its stealth and mobility.
strengths: Possesses damage immunity to acid and has superior maneuverability through climbing and flying.
weaknesses: Average health and dependence on positioning limit its durability in extended confrontations.
attacks: Uses a combination of bite attacks dealing piercing damage and claw attacks, alongside powerful breath weapons.
most_powerful_ability: Its Acid Breath can affect multiple targets at once, dealing significant area damage.
senses: Has blindsight with a range of 10 feet and darkvision that extends to 60 feet, enhancing its ability to navigate in darkness.
skills: Skilled in stealth with a +3 modifier, making it capable of quietly approaching enemies.
additional_information: Can use stealth advantage in mountainous regions due to 'Flow Within the Mountain'.
Features a special ability called 'Pounce' allowing it to knock enemies prone.
Can utilize two types of breath attacks: Acid Breath and Slowing Breath.
Possesses an average Dexterity score allowing for competent acrobatics in flight.
Typical for dragons, it communicates using Draconic.
